input.sentences: the farm we work at is quite big .
we work the fields quite often .
we are not the only ones that work hard though .
after working | we love relaxing on the beach with our dogs !
output.sentences: It was a perfect day on the farm near the mountains and sea.
Flowers blossomed as the sun shone bright.
The fields burst with a vibrant green.
Nearby, the city sounds of construction work could be heard.
And near the sea, a dog slept to the sound of the sea.
